title: Indian Flag WatchFace
summary: Celebrate your Independence with Indian Flag Watch Face
description: For Independence Day.Show your patriotism to your country India proudly with these Indian Flag inspired WatchFace designs for Round and Square Android Wear devices including the Sony SmartWatch 3, LG G Watch, Moto 360, Asus Zenwatch and more! This watch face collection is proudly made in support of the India!Ashoka Chakra rotate every seconds ;)Note: This watchface is optimized for both square and round screens.
descriptionHTML:
For Independence Day.

Show your patriotism to your country India proudly with these Indian Flag inspired WatchFace designs for Round and Square Android Wear devices including the Sony SmartWatch 3, LG G Watch, Moto 360, Asus Zenwatch and more! This watch face collection is proudly made in support of the India!

Ashoka Chakra rotate every seconds ;)

Note: This watchface is optimized for both square and round screens.
